title: Create video downloader for Instagram and Facebook

requirements.text: Create a frontend interface with input fields for Instagram and Facebook video URLs, allowing users to paste video links they want to download
acceptanceCriteria: User can paste Instagram video URLs into an input field
User can paste Facebook video URLs into an input field
Input validation shows clear error messages for invalid URLs
Interface clearly indicates which platforms are supported

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to fetch and process Instagram video content from provided URLs, extracting the video file without watermarks
acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts Instagram video URLs as input
System extracts video content from Instagram
Downloaded videos do not contain watermarks
Error handling for invalid or private Instagram URLs

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to fetch and process Facebook video content from provided URLs, extracting the video file without watermarks
acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts Facebook video URLs as input
System extracts video content from Facebook
Downloaded videos do not contain watermarks
Error handling for invalid or private Facebook URLs

requirements.text: Provide download functionality that allows users to save the processed videos to their local device
acceptanceCriteria: User can trigger download after video is processed
Downloaded file has appropriate video format and extension
Download includes original video quality
Clear feedback during download process

requirements.text: Design a modern, visually distinct interface with a creative color scheme (avoiding blue and purple), clear typography, and an intuitive layout that emphasizes simplicity and ease of use for video downloading
acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses a cohesive, non-blue/purple color palette
Typography is clear and readable
Layout guides users naturally through the download process
Visual design is consistent across all pages and components

constraints: Must not violate Instagram or Facebook terms of service
Only process publicly accessible video content
Do not store user-provided URLs or downloaded videos on the backend
nonGoals: Video editing or format conversion features
Support for other social media platforms beyond Instagram and Facebook

required: Hero background image with abstract gradient pattern suitable for a video downloader app (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Social media icon representing video download concept (download-icon.dim_256x256.png)
